resources.string: This is the default view when opening up Tap Tunes. Press the play button to play the tune or tap the album image to go the Tune Details view.

This artist was born on December 25, 1901. To pass the time, he sang tunes from dusk till dawn on his family farm. Eventually, he won singing competitions at church and in high school. At 18, after becoming valedictorian, Blue Records signed him on with his first single, Chickens and Squash.

The details view features the album image, song title, artist name, release year, genre, and artist bio. Tapping the album image brings the user back the main view and tapping the genre text opens up a list of related songs.
